title.narrative: DPSP III: Scaling Up Demand-Side Energy Efficiency Project

description.narrative: To support scale-up of investments in energy efficiency market in the country, ADB will provide a loan[1] to EESL to be guaranteed by the Government of India. Since its incorporation in 2009, EESL has created a “new normal” for more efficient lighting, pumping, and buildings, and will continue to service these traditional end-use market segments that present potential savings of terawatt-hours per year.

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
